abstract: Foreclosures remain “too high,” hurting not only homeowners but lenders and the broader economy, the Fed chief said.
snippet: Foreclosures remain “too high,” hurting not only homeowners but lenders and the broader economy, the Fed chief said.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve Board chairman said Thursday that the government and banks must do more to curb a flood of foreclosures that has devastated families and neighborhoods and now threatens to deepen the housing crisis.

headline.main: Bernanke Calls for More Help for Homeowners
headline.print_headline: Bernanke Calls for More Help for Homeowners
